channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024110756
item.description:
Report X-2024110756

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-22T12:30:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-08
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAZARDOUS PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. DAMAGE CONTAINED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS. CONTENTS OF PACKAGE WERE NOT DAMAGED. SHIPPER DOES NOT TAKE RETURNS IN SALVAGE DRUMS. PRODUCT PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS.

item.title: Report E-2024110324
item.description:
Report E-2024110324

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-18T12:24:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-12
  • City: NORTHBOROUGH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When loading drum into trailer material handler noticed there was a small leak around the large bung closure on the top of the drum. The bung closure was tightened, leaked material cleaned with absorbent, and the drum was delivered to ultimate consignee without further issue.
